column5: ATHX Regarding testing of MS and its window of efficacy isnt it 36 hours If so all the pertinent studies and results should take weeks or even days to get sorted out Why on earth is this team taking an eternity to prove or disprove the alleged benefits of the product Come on people wake up

ATHX If I dont hear anything good from the meeting today Im selling my position Im not in the business of watching the stock price drop day after day I dont understand why the CEO is not doing more to keep the price at a decent level I guess Ill take the loss and buy when I see some actual signs of caring by the ceo
ATHX Is this correct The Lower the share price the more management has to Dilute in order to pay the bills
ATHX 2019 is a non event year

ATHX Id like to welcome the new incoming class of Athersys bagholders Definitely a good lesson in who not to believe when it comes to investing in ATHX A new 52week low is not at all out of the question
